hibernate-mapping.query: select SysDate from PFMORM00056 where Name = :name and BranchCode = :branchCode and Active = true
update PFMORM00056 s set s.Status = :status, s.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Name = :name and s.Active = true

update PFMORM00056 s set s.Status = :status, s.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where ( s.Name = 'CommitFee' or s.Name = 'OVD_INT_CAL' ) and s.BranchCode = :sourcebr and s.Active = true

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedDate, s.CreatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId) from PFMORM00056 as s where ( s.Name =: name) and s.Active = true

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedDate, s.CreatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Name =: name and s.Id =: id and s.Active = true

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedDate, s.CreatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Active = true

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedDate, s.CreatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Id = :id and s.Active = true
select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysDate, s.SysQty ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Name =:name and s.Active = true and BranchCode=:sourceBr
update PFMORM00056 s set s.SysDate = :sysdate, s.Status='Y', s.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Name = :name and s.Active = true and BranchCode = :branchCode
select SysDate from PFMORM00056 where Name = :name and BranchCode = :branchCode and Active = true

update PFMORM00056 s set s.SysDate =case when s.Name = 'LAST_SETTLEMENT_DATE' then :lastSettlementDate when s.Name = 'NEXT_SETTLEMENT_DATE' then :nextSettlementDate else s.SysDate end, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where s.Active = true and s.BranchCode = :branchCode
select new sys001dto( s.SysDate, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Active = true and s.Name = :name and s.BranchCode = :sourcebr

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysDate, s.SysQty ) from PFMORM00056 as s where (s.Name = 'OVD_INT_CAL' or s.Name = 'COMMITFEES' or s.Name = 'SAV_INT_CAL' or s.Name = 'MONTH_CLOSE' or s.Name = 'LOAN_INT_CAL' or s.Name = 'LOAN_INT_CAL_MONTHLY' or s.Name = 'COMMIT_CHARGES') and s.BranchCode = :sourceBr and s.Active = true
select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysDate, s.SysQty ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Name =:name and s.SysDate = :sysDate and s.Status = :status and s.Active = true
update PFMORM00056 s set s.Status = :status, s.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Name = :name and s.BranchCode=:BranchCode and s.Active = true
update PFMORM00056 s set s.SysMonYear = :sysMonYear, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Name = :name and s.BranchCode = :sourceBr and s.Active = true

update PFMORM00056 s set s.Status = :status, s.SysMonYear = :sysMonYear, s.SysDate = :sysDate, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.Name = :name and s.BranchCode = :sourceBr and s.Active = true

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.SysMonYear, s.Status, s.SysDate, s.SysQty, s.BranchCode, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedDate, s.CreatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Name = :name and s.BranchCode = :sourcebr and s.Active = true

update PFMORM00056 s set s.SysDate =case when s.Name = 'FixIntDate' then :fixIntDate when s.Name = 'FixVouDate' then :fixVouDate when s.Name = 'FD_INT_CAL' then :fixIntCal else s.SysDate end, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where s.Active = true and s.BranchCode = :branchCode

select new sys001dto( s.Id, s.Name, s.Status, s.SysDate, s.BranchCode, s.Active ) from PFMORM00056 as s where s.Name in ('HPMonthly_AutoPay','PLMonthly_AutoPay','BLMonthly_AutoPay','HPLateFees_AutoPay','PLLateFees_AutoPay','BL_LF_AutoVoucher') and s.BranchCode = :sourceBr and s.Active = true
